title: Silver 1 looking to get to GOLD! HELP ME
body: currently in silver 1 with 2lp. main support (leona, thresh, sona and braum) looking for someone to help me. i get up to 50lp and cant get past beyond that >.> always losing after 50 points, someone help plssssss so close but yet so far

replies.body:
Oh i know how to do it. You just win games in ranked.

When you win games Riot rewards you with "LP" these are "League Points" With enough of them (100 to be exact) you will get a promotion series into Gold.

So yeah

TLDR - Win games.
